nodes.text: Tiss'Sharl was an astronomical object located in the Outer Rim Territories, positioned at the coordinates R-4 on the Standard Galactic Grid.
Tiss'Sharl was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2016.

In the Star Wars Legends continuity, the world was known as "Tiss'sharl" and was originally introduced in Han Solo and the Corporate Sector Sourcebook, a 1993 roleplaying guide written by Michael Allen Horne and published by West End Games for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
